name: Dig Dud
description:
Dig down and collect a bunch of lapis to get home! Be nimble as you hop from block to block in this challenging game! Will you be able to collect all the Lapis, and more importantly: the Special Ores?

Collect all special ores to unlock a SECRET ending!

Press "R" to retry a level.

Made for the 22nd gm(48) jam!
